title: Double Down
description: Rocco Neri, hot billionaire and the city’s most eligible widower, might be in the market for a mistress if he could find a woman who didn’t simper and laugh at everything he says. He’s not that funny.She needs to be feisty but know her place. And he doesn’t want her anywhere near his son, a sweet boy with a serious obsession with cats, Spider-Man and rocks. In that order.Eva Parr is certainly feisty. She’s a parolee with some unusual talents who is happy to take a mallet to his ego every chance she gets. Until she needs his help finding Ellie, a lost child. Rocco can’t turn her down. Together they hunt for a little girl who nobody else is looking for.Things get complicated and dangerous.Now Rocco has to keep Eva alive and find Ellie before the baby comes.
author: Susan Amanda Kelly
